name: 特殊教育導論
goals: To understand theoretical and applied information regarding special education
To understand the development and trends impacting the field of special education
To illustrate characteristics and educational needs of students with special needs
To understand the process of referral, identification, placement, service, and assessment for students with special needs
To improve the understanding, care, and acceptance to people with special needs
